title: LazAR
blurb: A mixed reality physical game using Lighthouse position tracking and Tango AR to create a laser maze puzzle
content_html:
Summary

We're all Vive developers who are interested in pushing the great Lighthouse tracking technology in new directions. We've developed hardware which works as a Lighthouse tracked object and were looking for a project to experiment with whole body tracking in a non-VR context. Mobile AR with Tango seemed like an excellent environment to pair this with.

Location

6th floor, table 39

Contact telephone

617.319.5217

Vertical

Entertainment & storytelling (with a side of human connection)
